title: Opening Session of the Board of Governors
snippet: The Opening Session of the EBRD Board of Governors will take place on the afternoon of Wednesday, 14 May 2025. The session, which provides an overview of the key themes of the Annual Meeting, will be addressed by a UK guest of honour, the Chair of the Board of Governors for 2024-25 and the EBRD President.

title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Currently (2024-2025) Slovenia is the Chair of Board of Governors, while Iceland and Turkey are the Vice Chairs. The Board of Directors consists of 23 members elected by the Board of Governors.
